modName: Fantasy Music Overhaul_Skyrim Soundtrack Expansion Merged CP
summary: This lets you hear the music added by both Fantasy Music Overhaul and Skyrim Soundtrack Expansion.
descriptionHtml:
In the "Skyrim Soundtrack Expansion" thread some people were asking for a compatability patch with Fantasy Music Overhaul. I used TES5Edit to add the tracks from SSE to the "Fantasy Music Overhaul", preserving all of Fantasy Music Overhaul's additions. Only 4 music lists were affected. I also removed the dirty edits that were in Skyrim Soundtrack Expansion.

This is just a plugin, so you need to download both:

Fantasy Music Overhaul: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28583/
Skyrim Soundtrack Expansion: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25163

Simply overwrite the Skyrim Soundtrack Expansion's esp and deactivate Fantasy Music Overhaul plugin.

This is my first ever mod and Nexus post, so contact me if I have done anything wrong or if there are any problems with the plugin. It should be easy to add your own music. You simply define a track in the Track branch of TES5Edit, and then add a reference to that track in the appropriate playlist.


Thanks to AceeQ for Fantasy Music Overhaul and Robert Scott for Skyrim Soundtrack Expansion.
author: Arahat
